trinnovProducts.name: Altitude32
trinnovProducts.headline: The Ultimate Experience in Immersive Audio
trinnovProducts.description: Peerless in performance, configurability and sound quality, the Altitude32 remains the unchallenged reference processor for immersive home theater systems. Nothing has been left to chance: high-channel count, huge processing power and exclusive patented technologies unleash the full potential of immersive sound, enabling all formats and the widest range of speaker layouts.
trinnovProducts.story:
Upgradable by Design. The hardware architecture of the Altitude32, unique among home theater processors, challenges the concept of obsolescence by enabling the integration of new technologies, new features, and product upgrades through a pure software implementation provided at no cost to Altitude owners. This is a truly sustainable product that gets better over time with the introduction of new features and a scalable, modular hardware design that enables easy system expansion up to the full channel counts of home Atmos and DTS:X and to a maximum of 64 outputs.

Its revolutionary hardware architecture runs not on the multiple sets of DSPs found on other processors but instead on a single multi-core Intel hardware platform and TrinnovOS operating system. This enables Trinnov to bring new technologies and features to market months and years ahead of competition.
features: Trinnov Optimizer with 3D microphone-based loudspeaker and room correction
Object-based immersive decoding for Dolby Atmos, DTS-X Pro, and Auro-3D
High-resolution audio processing up to 24-bit / 96 kHz with 64-bit floating-point engine
Flexible bass management and support for complex multichannel speaker layouts
applications: Reference home cinemas and screening rooms
Luxury media rooms with complex multichannel layouts
Private studios requiring precise room correction

trinnovProducts.name: Altitude16
trinnovProducts.headline: No Compromise. 20-Channel Reference Immersive Processor.
trinnovProducts.description: The groundbreaking Altitude32 set the bar high — and the Altitude16 keeps it there. Delivering the same processing capabilities and sound quality as Altitude32, Altitude16 brings Trinnov’s best-in-class performance to immersive systems that will not exceed 20 channels.
trinnovProducts.story:
No compromise on what matters: Altitude16 delivers the same processing engine and sound quality as Altitude32, tailored to immersive audio systems that will not exceed 20 channels. Equipped with Dolby Atmos®, Auro-3D®, and DTS:X® Pro decoders, it renders up to 20 discrete channels of information, natively processes high-resolution 24-bit / 96 kHz audio, and enables up to four-way active crossovers.

Altitude16 imposes no limitations on Atmos and DTS:X channel assignments or subwoofer outputs within its 20-channel envelope. It combines HDMI 2.1 connectivity (8 inputs, dual outputs with eARC on Output 1) with Trinnov Optimizer calibration, flexible bass management, and a software-defined platform designed to evolve over time.
features: Trinnov Optimizer with 3D microphone-based loudspeaker and room correction
Object-based immersive decoding for Dolby Atmos, DTS:X Pro, and Auro-3D
Native high-resolution processing up to 24-bit / 96 kHz with 64-bit floating-point engine
Up to four-way active crossovers plus advanced bass management
applications: Premium home cinemas and private theaters
High-end media rooms with immersive audio layouts
